messages.title: 'Rt. Hon Theresa May
messages.content: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan for a stronger Britain with a strong negotiating hand to deliver for Britain. Set out a 12-point plan for Brexit.
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs for more people across the country.
Provide real opportunity and support for all by building more affordable housing and making sure children attend good schools with a strong NHS.
Build a more secure and united nation by taking action against extremists and ensuring those who want to break up the UK are kept at bay.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. Plan for a stronger Britain with a strong negotiating hand to deliver for Britain. Set out a 12-point plan for Brexit.
issues.economy: Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs for more people across the country.
issues.education: Provide real opportunity and support for all by ensuring children attend good schools.
issues.health: Provide real opportunity and support for all by building more affordable housing and making sure children attend good schools with a strong NHS.

community.content: Ensure children attend good schools and fight for fairer funding for Trafford schools.

politicalExperience.achievements: Protected access to world-class hospital services at Wythenshawe and The Christie. Championed to stop the closure of Altrincham Hospital and to see a new hospital built.

endorsements.endorsement: One of the most highly regarded backbench MPs
Has a reputation for acting in an independently-minded manner
One of the most rational beings
